collection.name: Shrine to the Blue Star
collection.openText: We all return to that place some day. It’s an instinct.

specialTipSize.specialTip: The Abnormality will absorb the SP of the working employee as an offering. All employees in the facility who have less than 70% SP will recover SP at the same time. If O-03-93 is present in the facility, the recovery is doubled.

When less than 20 seconds of work time had taken place, or more than 40 seconds, the Abnormality will absorb all of the SP of the working employee in an instant. After, all employees in the department will heal 50 SP. Agents with Temperance or Prudence Level 4 or lower began to panic upon working with the Abnormality.
For every 50 SP absorbed by the Abnormality, the Qliphoth Counter increased by 1.
If an employee recovers more than 80 SP from the effects of this Abnormality, they will panic. This counter resets after a Qliphoth Meltdown occurs.

O-03-93-01 will escape when it has not been worked on for more than 130 seconds, or when the total number of employees put into a panic by this Abnormality esceeds five. When this happens, the Manager can choose to sacrifice an employee. After 5 successful sacrifices, O-03-93-01 will return to containment.
